content.en: Efficient DFT algorithms: Researchers have been investigating various questions related to the fast algorithms used for the discrete Fourier transform (DFT). They have explored algorithms for DFT with different orders, including those that are a power of two and those that are not. Additionally, they have developed methods to reduce the number of floating-point operations required for computing the DFT. These algorithms have the potential to improve the efficiency and speed of computations involving Fourier transforms.
content.da: Effektive DFT-algoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige spørgsmål relateret til de hurtige algoritmer, der anvendes til den diskrete Fourier-transform (DFT). De har udforsket algoritmer for DFT med forskellige ordener, herunder dem der er en potens af to og dem der ikke er. Derudover har de udviklet metoder til at reducere antallet af flydekommaoperationer, der er nødvendige for at beregne DFT. Disse algoritmer har potentiale til at forbedre effektiviteten og hastigheden af beregninger, der involverer Fourier-transformationer.
